definition: to make blood (function of bone marrow)
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
blood generating stem cells (in bone marrow)

sentences.english: Objective To improve the accuracy of imaging diagnosis of intrathoracic tumor-simulating extramedullary hematopoiesis(EMH).
sentences.chinese: 目的提高對胸內瘤樣髓外造血組織影像診斷的準確性。

sentences.english: Conclusion The placenta might be an another hematopoietic organ in ontogeny .
sentences.chinese: 結論胎盤是胎兒期造血器官之一。

sentences.english: The haemocytoblasts complete a process of maturation when flowing from the haemopoietic organs into the peripheral blood vessels.
sentences.chinese: 造血母細胞從造血器官釋放入外周血中有一成熟過程。

sentences.english: The haemocytoblasts complete a process of maturation when flowing from the haemopoietic organs into the peripheral blood vessels.
sentences.chinese: 造血母細胞從造血器官釋放入外周血中有一成熟過程。

sentences.english: The mother haemoblasts complete a process of maturation when flowing from the hematopoietic organs into the peripheral blood vessels.
sentences.chinese: 造血母細胞從造血器官釋放入外周血中有一成熟過程。

sentences.english: The mother haemoblasts complete a process of maturation when flowing from the hematopoietic organs into the peripheral blood vessels.
sentences.chinese: 造血母細胞從造血器官釋放入外周血中有一成熟過程。

sentences.english: Furthermore, Danggui Buxue Tang also can promote the production of blood and improve angiogenesis .
sentences.chinese: 當歸補血湯還具有促進造血和血管生成作用。

sentences.english: The production and deployment of phagocytes are central functions of the hematopoietic system.
sentences.chinese: 吞噬細胞產物和鋪開是造血系統的中央職能。

sentences.english: Allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation, Allo-HS.
sentences.chinese: 對異基因造血幹細胞移植。

sentences.english: If nephritic transplanting wins a success, hematopoiesis function can obtain apparent progress.
sentences.chinese: 腎臟移植如獲成功，造血功能可獲明顯進步。

sentences.english: Hemopoietic pro-genitor cells, hematopoietic stem cells, hematopoietic microenvironment etc. show dose related damage after irradiation, consequently, hematopoietic function is destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 等都會產生與照射劑量相關的損傷而影響造血機能。

sentences.english: What is dry cell of umbilical blood hematopoiesis?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是臍帶血造血幹細胞？

sentences.english: The viability of hemopoietic cells doesn' t decrease with the time of cryopreservation.
sentences.chinese: 造血細胞活力不隨保存時間延長而降低。

sentences.english: Conclusion There were many abnormalities in hematopoietic inductive microenvironment(HIM)of acute leukemia.
sentences.chinese: 結論急性白血病存在造血微環境異常。

sentences.english: Hematopoietic stem cell research is a new subject.
sentences.chinese: 造血幹細胞的研究是一門新興的學科。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of bong marrow stromal cells on ex vivo hematopoietic progenitor expansion.
sentences.chinese: 目的闡明基質細胞在造血細胞體外擴增中的作用。

definition: to transfuse blood/to give aid and support
the body/organism (usually human)/(fig.) fabric (of society etc)/cohesive structure (of an entity)
to support one's parents in their old age/to show filial piety/to to repay/to return a favor
to furnish/to provide/supply (as in supply and demand)
